comments.text: For CCs, we use type "cc14", for NRPN we use "nrpn". In the markdown, allow numbers in the first column to have C or N prefixes (default C if not specified). Later we can add S for SysEX. We can infer 7-bit/14-bit from range.

title: Add startup section to output JSON with control defaults
Figure out how to sync at startup (retrieve or send all params)
Reuse overlays for matching choice lists
close_reason: Already implemented: overlay_id_for() reuses overlays via dictionary lookup. Verified: 19 list controls use only 13 unique overlays.

title: Add optional Color/Colour column support for control colors
description: Allow optional 'Color' or 'Colour' column in input markdown tables with 6-character hex RGB values. Color applies to current row's control and all subsequent controls until next non-empty color value. Output JSON should include color at same level as control id in format: "color": "F45C51"

title: Add --pretty option for JSON output formatting
Add support for control modes in JSON and markdown (mode: default, unipolar, bipolar, momentary, toggle). Add 'Properties' column in markdown for non-default modes.
description: Support the 'mode' property in the JSON schema for controls, with allowed values: default, unipolar, bipolar, momentary, toggle. For faders, unipolar is default; for buttons, toggle is default. In the markdown spec, add an optional 'Properties' column to indicate any non-default mode for a control. Update code and documentation as needed.

title: Fix off by one errors in lists
Make use of metadata in markdown front matter

title: Support blank rows in markdown to skip controller positions
description: Allow users to insert blank rows in markdown tables to skip positions in the Electra One grid layout, giving more control over control placement
